definition: facing death/at death's door
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
to die/impassable/uncrossable/inflexible/rigid/extremely/damned
equanimity in the face of death/to face dangers with assurance

sentences.english: It has been supposed that Darwin renounced evolution on his deathbed.
sentences.chinese: 有人认为达尔文临死时否定了进化论。

sentences.english: I just want to make a new friend when I'm going todie.
sentences.chinese: 我只是想在临死之前多交一个朋友而已。

sentences.english: The second woman also recorded her statement before she died.
sentences.chinese: 第二位妇女也在临死前录下了证词。

sentences.english: My grandfather, on his deathbed, sold me this watch.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父，在他临死的时候，把这块表卖给了我。

sentences.english: It is said that he died clutching the script to 'The Final Curtain'.
sentences.chinese: 据说，他临死前紧紧抓着《黑幕风云》的剧本。

sentences.english: I can perhaps even picture the moment of my death.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至能想象自己临死的那一刻。

sentences.english: In stature she was tall, somewhat slender, and in her latter days, even emaciated.
sentences.chinese: 她身材修长，有点娇弱，临死前，竟是形销骨立。

sentences.english: In the end, Molly will gave birth to a son before dying down.
sentences.chinese: 最终，莫莉在临死之前将儿子生了下来。

sentences.english: We post to the website the near-death experience exactly as it was shared with us.
sentences.chinese: 我们贴在网站的临死体验完全是我们得到它时的模样。

sentences.english: Authorities do YuanQuan before his death is of all kinds of suggest that mean???????
sentences.chinese: 机关算尽的袁荃临死前的种种暗示意味着什么？

sentences.english: The die set static also want to know who is linghu chong.
sentences.chinese: 临死的定静还想知道令狐冲到底是谁。

sentences.english: Death of that a moment, two brothers got really get out of it.
sentences.chinese: 临死的那一刻，兄弟二人都得到了真正的摆脱。

sentences.english: Mendoza used a hostage as a human shield to protect himself, before being killed.
sentences.chinese: 门多萨在临死前还挟持了一名人质来做他的盾牌。

sentences.english: Before dying she made her sisters promise they’d keep her head in the hall.
sentences.chinese: 临死前，她让姐姐保证会把她的头颅留在房子里。

sentences.english: Liu Hulan glared the enemy before her death.
sentences.chinese: 刘胡兰临死前怒目而视着敌人。

definition: approaching one's end/with one foot in the grave
dying
to die/to breathe one's last
nearing death/on the point of demise/approaching extinction
to die
dead but will not close the eyes (idiom); to die with a remaining grievance
to checkmate (in chess)/to be about to die
words of the deceased/last words of the dying/wisdom of past sages
words of a man on his deathbed always come from the heart (proverb)
pinyin: ren2 zhi1 jiang1 si3 , qi2 yan2 ye3 shan4

definition: to go all out for sth at risk of one's life
to die tragically/to meet with a violent death
to kill oneself/suicide
to die/impassable/uncrossable/inflexible/rigid/extremely/damned
lit. the soul flies away and scatters (idiom)/fig. to be frightened stiff/spooked out of one's mind/terror-stricken
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
seriously ill and about to die
